MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Write it in the Roman alphabet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変らず真人の勉強の相手は大変だけど、何とか宿題の分は終わらせることが出来た。
MESSAGE.EN: It's difficult as always doing homework with Masato, but I managed to finish it somehow.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's difficult as always doing homework with Masato, but I managed to finish it somehow.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うお、今日ははええな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whoa, you're quick today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whoa, you're quick today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時計を見ると、夕食まではまだ一時間くらいあった。
MESSAGE.EN: I shot a glance at the clock, there was still an hour left before dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shot a glance at the clock, there was still an hour left before dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「終わったら暇だね。みんな来ないのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's nothing else to do now. Is everyone else coming over?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's nothing else to do now. Is everyone else coming over?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「謙吾の野郎も自主練に出てるみたいだしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That Kengo seems to be busy with his self-training.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That Kengo seems to be busy with his self-training.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とか話をしていると。
MESSAGE.EN: We were chatting about various stuff like this, when...
MESSAGE.Translation: We were chatting about various stuff like this, when...

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「ほわぁーっ、ごごごごごめんなさぁいーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Ho, howaa! I, I, I'm so～rry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Ho, howaa! I, I, I'm so～rry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …賑やかな声が聞こえてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We heard someone's lively voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We heard someone's lively voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの声は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That voice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That voice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ついでにこの展開は、間違いなく小毬さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no doubt, it was Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no doubt, it was Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと見てくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll take a look.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll take a look.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドアから出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped out through the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped out through the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、あのっ、友達の部屋と間違えただけで、別に覗くとかそんなんじゃなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, um... I was going to my friend's room and got the wrong door, it's not like I was peeking or anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, um... I was going to my friend's room and got the wrong door, it's not like I was peeking or anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 開いたドアの向こうに向かってひたすら謝っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was standing in the corridor, apologizing with all her might toward an open door opposite of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was standing in the corridor, apologizing with all her might toward an open door opposite of us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…小毬さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわあっ!!　あああうーっ、ごめんなさぁいっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howaa!! Aaaah, I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howaa!! Aaaah, I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: びっくりして振り返って即座に頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd been taken by surprise, and she bowed her head as she turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd been taken by surprise, and she bowed her head as she turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや僕だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's only me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's only me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…ああぁう…理樹君かぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Aaau... Riki-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Aaau... Riki-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …半べそだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She looked as though she could burst into tears at any moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She looked as though she could burst into tears at any moment.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何やってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What're you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What're you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君の部屋に行こうと思ったんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I was planning to go to your room, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I was planning to go to your room, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ノックしても返事なかったから、開けてみようと思って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I knocked but there was no answer, so I decided to open the door and look inside...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I knocked but there was no answer, so I decided to open the door and look inside...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「開けたところで違う人の部屋だって気付いて、びっくりしてどうしようもなかったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I realized it was someone else's room once I opened the door and I had no idea what to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I realized it was someone else's room once I opened the door and I had no idea what to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いまいち要領を得ない説明だったけど、大体の状況は掴めた。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't the most informative explanation ever, but I got the gist of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't the most informative explanation ever, but I got the gist of it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「返事がないって、中に人がいないんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If there was no answer, maybe there was nobody inside in the first place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If there was no answer, maybe there was nobody inside in the first place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はノックして、そのドアの中を覗いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I knocked on the door and peeked inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knocked on the door and peeked inside.

MESSAGE.JP: …電気も付いてない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The lights were off.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The lights were off.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ああう…私、誰に向かって謝ってたんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Aau... Who was I apologizing to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Aau... Who was I apologizing to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そそっかしい人だった。
MESSAGE.EN: What a careless person.
MESSAGE.Translation: What a careless person.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで、僕の部屋にって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what about my room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what about my room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、えーと、これだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, um... This here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, um... This here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手にしたビニール袋を掲げる。中には何やら紙箱が入っているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She held up a plastic bag to me. There was something like a cardboard box inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held up a plastic bag to me. There was something like a cardboard box inside.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What's that?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What's that?

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「今日のお礼に持ってきたんだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝This is to express my thanks for today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝This is to express my thanks for today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、お礼？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, thanks?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, thanks?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、どーなつです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, they're donuts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, they're donuts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おすすめのだけ選んできたから、きっとおいしいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I chose them because they came highly recommended, I'm sure they're deli～cious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I chose them because they came highly recommended, I'm sure they're deli～cious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お礼って、そんなたいしたことしてないのに悪いよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That wasn't anything you needed to thank us for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That wasn't anything you needed to thank us for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ううん、私がありがとうって思ったから、お礼をするのは普通だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Nope, I was grateful to you, so it is natural to thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Nope, I was grateful to you, so it is natural to thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「私もいっしょに食べるから、みんなでいっぱい幸せなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'll have some too, there'll be lots of happiness for everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll have some too, there'll be lots of happiness for everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それに、本当はこれおすそ分けしてもらったのだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Besides, to be honest I received it as a gift.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Besides, to be honest I received it as a gift.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、じゃあ貰おうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I guess I should accept it then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I guess I should accept it then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、恭介さんと謙吾君は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, what about Kyousuke-san and Kengo-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, what about Kyousuke-san and Kengo-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それに、りんちゃんの分もあるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝And, there's some for Rin-chan too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝And, there's some for Rin-chan too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、みんな呼んでみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll call everyone then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll call everyone then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 夕食前だけど、みんな小腹を空かせてるだろうし、多分来てくれるだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was still before dinner though, but I bet everyone's a little hungry so they won't turn it down...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was still before dinner though, but I bet everyone's a little hungry so they won't turn it down...

MESSAGE.JP: …程なくして、みんなが集合する。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It didn't take long before everyone was assembled.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It didn't take long before everyone was assembled.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾もちょうど練習を切り上げるところだったらしく、そのまま来てくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo had just finished his practice, so he came straight from there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo had just finished his practice, so he came straight from there.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「わざわざ悪いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Thanks for going out of your way for this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Thanks for going out of your way for this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、みんなどうぞ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Everyone, help yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Everyone, help yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが箱を開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened the box.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened the box.

MESSAGE.JP: 三種類が二個ずつ、計六個のドーナツが入っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were two of each of three kinds of donuts, totaling six in all.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were two of each of three kinds of donuts, totaling six in all.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うお、美味そうじゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwoh, it looks delicious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwoh, it looks delicious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺はどれでも構わん。おまえら先に選んでいいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I don't care which I get. You can go ahead and choose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I don't care which I get. You can go ahead and choose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、そう？　私もどれも好きだから、先にとっていいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mm, really? I like them all, so go ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mm, really? I like them all, so go ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、理樹選べよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then Riki, you choose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then Riki, you choose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん、じゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mm, then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mm, then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、この普通ので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I'll take the plain one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I'll take the plain one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、理樹君なかなか通ですねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, Riki-kun is quite an expert.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, Riki-kun is quite an expert.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そうなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, I am?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, I am?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「このお店のは生地がすごいおいしいからー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝This shop makes the best dough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝This shop makes the best dough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「しんぷるに生地の味だけでもすごいおいしいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝A simple donut can really bring out the taste of the dough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝A simple donut can really bring out the taste of the dough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hoo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hoo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごいおいしい、を二回続けて言われると、本当においしいんだろう、という気になってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was utterly delicious, I'd gladly have another.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was utterly delicious, I'd gladly have another.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、チョコ貰おうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I'll take the chocolate one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I'll take the chocolate one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「チョコは美味しいよねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Chocolate is yummy, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Chocolate is yummy, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんかこの縞模様が美味しそうだったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's because this striped pattern looks very appealing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's because this striped pattern looks very appealing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「模様が入ってると楽しいよねぇ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's fun when they have different patterns～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's fun when they have different patterns～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, this one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, this one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それが一番おすすめなんだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I recommend this one the most～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I recommend this one the most～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ストロベリーカスタードフレンチっていうんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's called French Strawberry Custard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's called French Strawberry Custard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hee...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hee...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「表面のストロベリーと中のカスタードとふわふわな生地が最高なんだよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝A strawberry on the top, custard inside and an airy dough together make the best combination～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝A strawberry on the top, custard inside and an airy dough together make the best combination～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よほど好きなのか、説明にも熱が篭っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She must really like it, as she was explaining everything excitedly and in great detail.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must really like it, as she was explaining everything excitedly and in great detail.

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで、お茶も用意してみんなで食べる事にする。
MESSAGE.EN: We prepared some tea and began eating together.
MESSAGE.Translation: We prepared some tea and began eating together.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うめぇーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Delicious～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Delicious～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人はすでに一口で食べてしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato had already finished eating his in one bite.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato had already finished eating his in one bite.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「洋菓子もたまには悪くないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Western pastry isn't bad from time to time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Western pastry isn't bad from time to time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は甘いものが苦手なので、デコレートのない普通のドーナツを選んだようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo didn't much like sweet things, so he chose a simple donut with no filling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo didn't much like sweet things, so he chose a simple donut with no filling.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は一番甘そうなストロベリーのドーナツを選んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin chose the one that looked the sweetest of them all, a strawberry donut.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin chose the one that looked the sweetest of them all, a strawberry donut.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「やべえーっ!!　もうねええーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No way! All gone!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No way! All gone!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「先にひとりだけ食べちゃうからでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's because you wolfed it down right away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's because you wolfed it down right away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、食べるとするか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, I should have some too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, I should have some too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、どうぞ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, go ahead please～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, go ahead please～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えへへ、私も食べよっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe, I'll dig in too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe, I'll dig in too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 箱のなかに手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hand into the box.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hand into the box.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「りんちゃん、半分こしませんかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, let's split.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, let's split.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「は、半分こ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sp, split?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sp, split?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 驚きすぎ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was taken by surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was taken by surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そしたら二種類食べられるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝If we do that, we can try two different kinds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝If we do that, we can try two different kinds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頷くと、半分にしたドーナツを小毬さんに手渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded and gave half her donut to Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded and gave half her donut to Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃ、はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんも同じようにして、鈴に渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: Similarly, Komari-san handed half of her donut to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Similarly, Komari-san handed half of her donut to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: その光景を見ながら、僕は思う。
MESSAGE.EN: As I watched them, I had a thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I watched them, I had a thought.

MESSAGE.JP: もしここに、朱鷺戸さんが居たなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If Tokido-san were here right now,
MESSAGE.Translation: If Tokido-san were here right now,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は迷わず、朱鷺戸さんと半分こしていただろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wouldn't hesitate to give her half of mine...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wouldn't hesitate to give her half of mine...

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか、それを思うと胸の奧が痛い。
MESSAGE.EN: When I thought about that, my chest stung a little...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I thought about that, my chest stung a little...

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸さんは面白くて、可愛くて、格好いいのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Tokido-san is funny, cute, and cool...
MESSAGE.Translation: Tokido-san is funny, cute, and cool...

MESSAGE.JP: ここに居る僕以外の生徒とは知り合わず、この学園を去っていくんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: But she'll leave this school not knowing anyone here but me...
MESSAGE.Translation: But she'll leave this school not knowing anyone here but me...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が好きになった朱鷺戸さんなら…みんなも間違いなく好きになってくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: If it's the Tokido-san that I've come to love... I'm sure everyone else would like her too.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it's the Tokido-san that I've come to love... I'm sure everyone else would like her too.

MESSAGE.JP: なのに、なのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: But even so...
MESSAGE.Translation: But even so...

MESSAGE.JP: 泣きそうになる…。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like crying...
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like crying...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、交換はいいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, can we exchange?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, can we exchange?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が慰めるように声をかけてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke called out in a comforting voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke called out in a comforting voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺らも半分ずつにしようぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We can split ours in halves too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We can split ours in halves too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure. Thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure. Thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も恭介と半分ずつにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke and I split our donuts between ourselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke and I split our donuts between ourselves.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なるほど、それはいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see, that's a good idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see, that's a good idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、俺らも半分ずつにするか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, let's split ours too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, let's split ours too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も恭介と半分ずつにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke and I divided our donuts between ourselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke and I divided our donuts between ourselves.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「謙吾…交換しようぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kengo... Let's trade.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kengo... Let's trade.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「何とだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝With what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝With what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「腐りかけの真っ黒なバナナ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝A rotten black banana.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝A rotten black banana.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そんなもんいるか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You think I want that...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You think I want that...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドーナツを食べ終えると、小毬さんは女子寮に帰っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: After we finished our donuts, Komari-san returned to the girls' dormitory.
MESSAGE.Translation: After we finished our donuts, Komari-san returned to the girls' dormitory.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さて、もう少し時間潰してから飯だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, we have some more time to kill before dinner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, we have some more time to kill before dinner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、美味かったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, was it good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, was it good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…おいしかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...It was delicious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...It was delicious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「満足げだな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Are you satisfied?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Are you satisfied?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大満足さ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Very much satisfied.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Very much satisfied.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …とても機嫌がいいようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He seemed to be in high spirits.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He seemed to be in high spirits.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よぅし、今夜も昨日の続きだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's continue from yesterday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's continue from yesterday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃーう。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『おなかすいたか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Are you hungry?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Are you hungry?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は猫と話しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was talking to a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was talking to a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『よしよし、たくさん缶詰とってこような』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Alrighty, I'll bring you lots of cat food.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Alrighty, I'll bring you lots of cat food.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ん？　誰かきた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Mm? Someone's here.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Mm? Someone's here.]

MESSAGE.JP: その鈴がこちらに向けて言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She informed us.
MESSAGE.Translation: She informed us.

MESSAGE.JP: まだ校舎内には入っていないはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she wasn't in the school building yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she wasn't in the school building yet.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「先生か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A teacher?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A teacher?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『いや、女の子だ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No, a girl.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No, a girl.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さて、表に鈴を待機させてるはいいが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's nice having Rin on standby outdoors, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's nice having Rin on standby outdoors, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「相変わらずやることがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's nothing for her to do, as usual.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's nothing for her to do, as usual.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「やることがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's nothing for her to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's nothing for her to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、中に入れてあげようよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's tell her to go inside then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's tell her to go inside then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、なんかは思いつくだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, we'll think of something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, we'll think of something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃーう。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『おなかすいたか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Are you hungry?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Are you hungry?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は猫と話しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was talking to a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was talking to a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『うーん、なんもないな…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Mm, there's nothing left...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Mm, there's nothing left...]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ん？　誰かきた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Mm? Someone's here.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Mm? Someone's here.]

MESSAGE.JP: その鈴がこちらに向けて言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She informed us.
MESSAGE.Translation: She informed us.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「先生か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A teacher?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A teacher?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『いや、女の子だ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No, a girl.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No, a girl.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「知ってるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You know her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You know her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『知らない。だけど同じ二年だ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I don't. But she's a second year too.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I don't. But she's a second year too.]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ？　また勧誘させるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What? Again with that recruiting stuff?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What? Again with that recruiting stuff?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「とりあえず話しかけさせるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We'll have Rin talk to her for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We'll have Rin talk to her for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「もうこれ以上女はいらねーだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We don't need any more girls...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We don't need any more girls...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@『こんばんは、棗さん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Good evening, Natsume-san.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Good evening, Natsume-san.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ん!?　…こんばんは』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Mm!? ...Good evening.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Mm!? ...Good evening.]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありゃ、先に挨拶されちまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, she's the one who greeted first...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, she's the one who greeted first...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「友好的でいい人そうじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She sounds like a friendly person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She sounds like a friendly person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@『古式っていいます』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[My name's Koshiki.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[My name's Koshiki.]

MESSAGE.JP: 相手はそう続けて自己紹介した。
MESSAGE.EN: She proceeded to introduce herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She proceeded to introduce herself.

MESSAGE.JP: その渦中の人の名に、僕らは同時に固まる。
MESSAGE.EN: We stiffened at once, upon hearing her name.
MESSAGE.Translation: We stiffened at once, upon hearing her name.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Ko...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Ko...]

MESSAGE.JP: それは鈴とて同じようだ。言葉に詰まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, too, was at a loss as to what to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, too, was at a loss as to what to say.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...Konishiki?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...Konishiki?]

MESSAGE.JP: 聞き間違えていただけだった！
MESSAGE.EN: She simply didn't hear her name right!
MESSAGE.Translation: She simply didn't hear her name right!

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『いえ、こしき、です』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[No, it's Koshiki.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[No, it's Koshiki.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『こしき…ああ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Koshiki... Aah.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Koshiki... Aah.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴なら、噂をそのまま口にしてしまいかねないと肝を冷やしたが、そこで言葉を止めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a bad feeling. Rin could easily spill out all the rumors she'd heard about her, but she stopped at that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a bad feeling. Rin could easily spill out all the rumors she'd heard about her, but she stopped at that.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『いつも、宮沢さんにはお世話になっています』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[Miyazawa-san always takes care of me...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[Miyazawa-san always takes care of me...]

MESSAGE.JP: そう古式さんの言葉が続いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She continued her monologue.
MESSAGE.Translation: She continued her monologue.

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『ありがとうございました、と…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[I'm thankful to him for that, and...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[I'm thankful to him for that, and...]

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『いえ、よろしくお伝えください』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[No, please give him my best regards.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[No, please give him my best regards.]

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Sure...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Sure...]

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『それでは、おやすみなさい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[Then, good night.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[Then, good night.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「引き留めろ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Stop her!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Stop her!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは驚いた。その言葉を発したのは謙吾だったから。
MESSAGE.EN: We were startled, but the one who said these words was Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were startled, but the one who said these words was Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、引き留めるんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, stop her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, stop her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介がそう続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke continued.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke continued.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『待てっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Wait up!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Wait up!]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が鋭くとがめるように言い放つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin said sharply, almost threateningly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin said sharply, almost threateningly.

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『…なにか』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[...What's the matter?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[...What's the matter?]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ、勧誘か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, wanna invite her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, wanna invite her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「いや、野球のことは言うな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No, don't mention baseball...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No, don't mention baseball...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ただの無駄話でいい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Talk about any foolish things that come to mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Talk about any foolish things that come to mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…なんでもいい、話を繋いでくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Anything is fine, just keep her talking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Anything is fine, just keep her talking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『うーむ、そうだな…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Um... Let me see...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Um... Let me see...]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…趣味は？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...What are your hobbies?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...What are your hobbies?]

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『ありません』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[I don't have any.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[I don't have any.]

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『それを探せって、いつも宮沢さんに言われてます』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[Miyazawa-san is always telling me to find some.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[Miyazawa-san is always telling me to find some.]

MESSAGE.JP: 自嘲気味に言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said in a self-derisive tone.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said in a self-derisive tone.

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『宮沢さんの趣味はご存じですか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[Do you know about Miyazawa-san's hobbies?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[Do you know about Miyazawa-san's hobbies?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『あいつの趣味？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[His hobbies?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[His hobbies?]

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「読書だと言え、いつだって、本を読んでいるとっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Reading books, tell her I'm always reading books.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Reading books, tell her I'm always reading books.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『…読書だって言うんですよ。いつも部屋では本を読んでいるらしいんです』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[...He says he likes reading. Apparently he's always reading books in his room.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[...He says he likes reading. Apparently he's always reading books in his room.]

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの言葉がかぶった。鈴は聴き取れない、というふうにえ？と問い返した。
MESSAGE.EN: Their words overlapped. Rin failed to catch Kengo's words and asked back in puzzlement.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their words overlapped. Rin failed to catch Kengo's words and asked back in puzzlement.

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『宮沢さんの趣味です、読書。あの人、そんなに読書家なんですか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[Miyazawa-san's hobby; reading. Is he really such an avid reader?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[Miyazawa-san's hobby; reading. Is he really such an avid reader?]

MESSAGE.JP: 古式さんだけが言い直した。
MESSAGE.EN: Koshiki-san was the only one to repeat herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Koshiki-san was the only one to repeat herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…いや、それはないな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...No, he's not.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...No, he's not.]

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『宮沢さんも、ずっと剣の道を歩まれてきた人ですもんね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[Miyazawa-san has always been walking the path of the sword.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[Miyazawa-san has always been walking the path of the sword.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『そうだな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Right.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Right.]

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は、もう何かを諦めてしまったように、顔を伏せてしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo hung his head in defeat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo hung his head in defeat.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『その目は痛むのか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Does your eye hurt?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Does your eye hurt?]

MESSAGE.JP: ぶしつけにそんなことを訊いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked boldly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked boldly.

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『そうですね、すごく、痛いです』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[It does, it hurts, a lot.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[It does, it hurts, a lot.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『可哀想だ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[That's a pity.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[That's a pity.]

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『痛み入ります』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[Thank you.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[Thank you.]

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『…それではそろそろ部屋に戻らないといけないので』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[...Well, I have to get back to my room soon.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[...Well, I have to get back to my room soon.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『うん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Yeah.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Yeah.]

MESSAGE.JP: `古式@『おやすみなさい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Koshiki@[Good night.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Koshiki@[Good night.]

MESSAGE.JP: もう会話はない。古式さんは立ち去ったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Their dialogue was over, Koshiki-san already walking away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their dialogue was over, Koshiki-san already walking away.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…なんだったんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...What was that about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...What was that about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が訊くも、謙吾は黙ったままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo left the question unanswered, remaining deep in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo left the question unanswered, remaining deep in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@『…こんばんは、棗さん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[...Good evening, Natsume-san.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[...Good evening, Natsume-san.]

MESSAGE.JP: そして、新たな声。
MESSAGE.EN: And a new voice appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: And a new voice appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『笹瀬川佐々美っ！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasegawa!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasegawa!]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「またでやがった!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She met her again!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She met her again!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『宮沢様のことをお話ししてましたわね？　聞こえてましたわよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[You were talking about Miyazawa-sama, no? I heard you.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[You were talking about Miyazawa-sama, no? I heard you.]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「しかしおまえ、人気者だなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just, how popular are you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just, how popular are you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『宮沢様の趣味がどうとかって。なんですの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Miyazawa-sama's hobbies, what about them?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Miyazawa-sama's hobbies, what about them?]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あいつの趣味は割り箸を集めて筏を作ることだ。この前失敗して沈んでいた、と言えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Say his hobby is collecting wooden chopsticks and making a raft with them. He failed last time and it sank.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Say his hobby is collecting wooden chopsticks and making a raft with them. He failed last time and it sank.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『あいつの趣味は割り箸を集めて筏を作ることだ。この前失敗して沈んでいた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[His hobby is collecting wooden chopsticks and making a raft with them. He failed last time and it sank.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[His hobby is collecting wooden chopsticks and making a raft with them. He failed last time and it sank.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『う…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Ugh...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Ugh...]

MESSAGE.JP: 少し引いた！
MESSAGE.EN: She cringed a bit.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cringed a bit.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『ロ、ロマンがあって、大変素敵な趣味ですわね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[I, it's very romantic, what a wonderful hobby.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[I, it's very romantic, what a wonderful hobby.]

MESSAGE.JP: なんとか受け入れた！
MESSAGE.EN: She somehow bought into it!
MESSAGE.Translation: She somehow bought into it!

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『でも失敗したのは残念ですわね。それ、あなたも手伝ったのかしら？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[It's too bad he failed. Did you help him?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[It's too bad he failed. Did you help him?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『手伝ってもないし、そもそも真人の嘘だから作ってもいない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I didn't, and it's just something Masato made up, so he didn't make anything in the first place.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I didn't, and it's just something Masato made up, so he didn't make anything in the first place.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『く…またなのっ、わたくしを馬鹿にしてっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Guh... Are you making a fool of me again?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Guh... Are you making a fool of me again?]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『それは、わたくしへの挑戦状ですのね？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Are you daring me for a challenge with that?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Are you daring me for a challenge with that?]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『いいでしょう…今日こそはそのへらず口、叩けなくしてやりますわ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Fine by me... Today as well I shall shut that insolent mouth of yours.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Fine by me... Today as well I shall shut that insolent mouth of yours.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『おまえたちっ、やっておしまいなさいっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]

MESSAGE.JP: びしっ！　ばしっ！　ばきっ！　どぐっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これだけどつきあって、よくアザ作らずに無事に戻ってこれるよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a miracle how she manages to return every time without so much as a bruise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a miracle how she manages to return every time without so much as a bruise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はいはい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしまで長い道のりでしたわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You've come a long way to finally face me now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You've come a long way to finally face me now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あーもう、ぜっったい今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやりますわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah geez, this time I'll make you eat dirt for sure!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah geez, this time I'll make you eat dirt for sure!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「見てなさい!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Just you watch!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Just you watch!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「このわたくしが…４戦４敗…ありえないことですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝For me... to lose four battles out of four... is unthinkable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝For me... to lose four battles out of four... is unthinkable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやりますわ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今度は本気で参りますわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら意外にやりますのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「こんな尻の青い下級生にすら勝てないなんて、話にもならないですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ミッションコンプリート』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、してないしてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、戦利品だ。やる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「念願の打倒棗鈴をついに佐々美様が達成された！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふっふっふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Fufufu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Fufufu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「って、念願とか、ついには余計ですわっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wha-, don't say things like long-sought or finally!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wha-, don't say things like long-sought or finally!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これぐらいお手の物ですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This much is an easy task for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This much is an easy task for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「はっ、お手の物でございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Ma'am, an easy task it was!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Ma'am, an easy task it was!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いきますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「本気になれば、よっっゆーーっですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ざっとこんなものですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は結局何も言わないまま、部屋を出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo didn't say anything in the end and just walked out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo didn't say anything in the end and just walked out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どういうことなんだ？　さっぱり解せねぇぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What was that all about? I have absolutely no idea...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What was that all about? I have absolutely no idea...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんな謙吾、見たことないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That Kengo, I've never seen him like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That Kengo, I've never seen him like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういや、と思い出す。昨日の放課後、校舎裏で見た謙吾も、似たような感じだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered. Yesterday after school, when I saw Kengo behind the school building, I had been getting a similar vibe.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered. Yesterday after school, when I saw Kengo behind the school building, I had been getting a similar vibe.

MESSAGE.JP: 何か、古式さんのことで問題を抱えてるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Was there a problem concerning Koshiki-san?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was there a problem concerning Koshiki-san?

MESSAGE.JP: ただ謙吾の性格を考えると…僕らに相談してくれそうもなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But given Kengo's personality... He wouldn't consult us about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But given Kengo's personality... He wouldn't consult us about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕たちはどうするべきかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should we do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should we do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 誰に対するでもなく、呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I muttered, not intending anyone else to hear.
MESSAGE.Translation: I muttered, not intending anyone else to hear.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大丈夫だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もちろん、答えてくれたのは恭介だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, it was Kyousuke who replied.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, it was Kyousuke who replied.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺たちは今まで通りでな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We'll just continue being as we are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We'll just continue being as we are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さて、気を取り直して続きといくか。鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, to get the mood back to normal, let's continue. Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, to get the mood back to normal, let's continue. Rin?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Wha...!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Wha...!?]

MESSAGE.JP: いきなり驚いた声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: All of a sudden I heard her surprised voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of a sudden I heard her surprised voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうした、何かあったのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong, did something happen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong, did something happen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『黒い制服の…集団に…囲まれた…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'm surrounded... by a group... of people in black uniforms...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'm surrounded... by a group... of people in black uniforms...]

MESSAGE.JP: 黒いならこの学校指定の制服だと思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was dark, so that black uniform was probably the school uniform...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was dark, so that black uniform was probably the school uniform...

MESSAGE.JP: `声@『後は我々に任せてただちに部屋に戻りなさい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Leave the rest to us; return to your room at once.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Leave the rest to us; return to your room at once.]

MESSAGE.JP: 凛然とした声が携帯越しに届く。
MESSAGE.EN: An authoritative voice was coming from the cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: An authoritative voice was coming from the cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おいおい、なんだなんだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, what the hell is that...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, what the hell is that...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだかやばそうだよ…助けにいこうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It sounds dangerous... Let's go help her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It sounds dangerous... Let's go help her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、そいつらなら、鈴には無害さ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, they won't harm Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, they won't harm Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「知ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「噂だけはな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just some rumors.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just some rumors.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大丈夫だ、鈴。おまえには手を出さない。後はそいつらに任せて帰ってくるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's all right, Rin. They won't touch you. Leave the rest to them and come back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's all right, Rin. They won't touch you. Leave the rest to them and come back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ほんとかっ？　こいつらこわっ！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Really? They're scary!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Really? They're scary!]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『近くでみるとさらにこわっ！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[When I look closer, they're even scarier!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[When I look closer, they're even scarier!]

MESSAGE.JP: ならわざわざ口に出さないでよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did she have to say all this...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did she have to say all this...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『棒でつついてみよう…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'll try poking them with a stick...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'll try poking them with a stick...]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいやいや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「後始末だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The cleaners.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The cleaners.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、ということは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, so you mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, so you mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「このミッションはタイムオーバーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The time limit for this mission is up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The time limit for this mission is up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 時間制限なんてあったのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Was there ever a time limit...
MESSAGE.Translation: Was there ever a time limit...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾の件もそうだけど、なんだか収まりが悪すぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: The deal with Kengo aside, this was a lousy ending.
MESSAGE.Translation: The deal with Kengo aside, this was a lousy ending.

MESSAGE.JP: これ以上鈴が危ない目に遭わないんだからよかったは、よかったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm glad that Rin won't have to face danger any more though.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm glad that Rin won't have to face danger any more though.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さて…今夜で謎のこの戦いを終わらせよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Now... We'll put an end to the battle against the mysterious lifeform tonight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now... We'll put an end to the battle against the mysterious lifeform tonight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、これを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, take this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, take this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: バイオ田中から託された注射器を鈴に渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: He passed a syringe he'd received from Bio-Tanaka to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: He passed a syringe he'd received from Bio-Tanaka to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだこれは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「謎の生き物に効く薬だ。こいつを打ってやればそいつは元の姿に戻れる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A medicine effective against the mysterious lifeform. If you give him a shot of this, he'll return to his original form.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A medicine effective against the mysterious lifeform. If you give him a shot of this, he'll return to his original form.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あいつはそこまで言い切ってはなかったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He didn't actually say that latter part himself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He didn't actually say that latter part himself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「生命体の世話をしてた奴さ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The guy who was taking care of the lifeform.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The guy who was taking care of the lifeform.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あんなのを飼ってるやつがいるのか、すごいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There's someone who'd keep that thing, amazing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There's someone who'd keep that thing, amazing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「真人、こいつは効く。そう信じることが大切なんだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Masato, it'll work. It's important to believe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Masato, it'll work. It's important to believe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…なるほど、わかったよ。そいつは効く。そう信じよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...All right, I get it. It'll work. Let's believe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...All right, I get it. It'll work. Let's believe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「元の姿とはなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝His original form is what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝His original form is what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「打てばわかるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You'll know once you give him the shot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You'll know once you give him the shot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でもこれを打つには弱らせる必要がある。だから、可哀想だが、いつものように戦う必要がある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝However you'll have to weaken him before that. So, it's unfortunate, but you'll have to fight him like before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝However you'll have to weaken him before that. So, it's unfortunate, but you'll have to fight him like before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「結局そこか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So it comes down to that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So it comes down to that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これはおまえにしかできない。できるな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This is something only you can do. What do you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This is something only you can do. What do you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「注射なんてうったことないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I've never given a shot before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I've never given a shot before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「教えてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'll teach you how.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'll teach you how.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、準備はいいか、オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, are you ready yet? Over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, are you ready yet? Over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『問題ない。オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[All set. Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[All set. Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「では潜入せよ、オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then begin infiltration, over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then begin infiltration, over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『了解。オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Roger. Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Roger. Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「状況はどうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's the situation?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's the situation?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『いた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[It's here.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[It's here.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ほんとか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Really!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Really!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『雑木林で待ってた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[It was waiting in the woods.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[It was waiting in the woods.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『戦闘開始だ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Commencing battle.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Commencing battle.]

MESSAGE.JP: じりじりとすり足で寄っているのか、砂利のこすれる音が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was shuffling along, slowly drawing closer, I heard the sound of pebbles in motion.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was shuffling along, slowly drawing closer, I heard the sound of pebbles in motion.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『うわっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Whoa.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Whoa.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『あいつ、速いぞ！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[He's fast!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[He's fast!]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『昨日とタイミングがぜんぜん違う』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[The timing is completely different from yesterday.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[The timing is completely different from yesterday.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…まさか、さらに進化したのか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...No way, did it evolve even further?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...No way, did it evolve even further?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『しるかっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How the hell should I know!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How the hell should I know!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「駄目か…鈴、もういい退却だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No good... Rin, it's okay, retreat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No good... Rin, it's okay, retreat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…悔しいがオーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...It's frustrating, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...It's frustrating, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺が行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'll go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'll go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「残念だけどタイムオーバーだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝I'm afraid time's up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝I'm afraid time's up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつの間にか僕らの後ろにバイオ田中が立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Since who knows when, Bio-Tanaka was standing behind us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since who knows when, Bio-Tanaka was standing behind us.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どういうことだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What do you mean...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What do you mean...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「きみたちが失敗したら、闇の執行部が動くことになっているんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝Since you failed, the darkness executives began their own operation...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝Since you failed, the darkness executives began their own operation...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「闇の…執行部…存在したのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Darkness... executives... Do they really exist...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Darkness... executives... Do they really exist...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ、そりゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「噂だけは聞いてるようだね。その通り、どうにもできなくなった問題を人知れず闇の中で葬っていく執行部のことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝This is just a rumor I heard. But according to it, they're the executives who, unnoticed by all, bury the problems nobody else can solve in the dark.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝This is just a rumor I heard. But according to it, they're the executives who, unnoticed by all, bury the problems nobody else can solve in the dark.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あいつはどうなるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What'll happen to him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What'll happen to him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「これまでどおり…人知れず葬られる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝Just like everything else... Buried, unnoticed by all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝Just like everything else... Buried, unnoticed by all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そ、そんなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Th, that's horrible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Th, that's horrible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえ、それでよかったのかよっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Are you okay with that...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Are you okay with that...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「だから君たちにすがったんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝That's why I relied on your powers...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝That's why I relied on your powers...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだったのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is that so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「すまないな、バイオ田中…期待に応えてやれなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, Bio-Tanaka... We failed to meet your expectations...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, Bio-Tanaka... We failed to meet your expectations...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「いいや…自業自得さ…僕のバイオクッキーのせいだからね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝No... You reap what you sow... It was all my mistake for making the bio-cookies...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝No... You reap what you sow... It was all my mistake for making the bio-cookies...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そりゃそうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「ありがとう。みんなもありがとう。妹さんにもありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝Thank you. Everyone else, thank you. Thanks to your little sister too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝Thank you. Everyone else, thank you. Thanks to your little sister too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「グッバイ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝Goodbye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝Goodbye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: バイオ田中は去っていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: He walked away...
MESSAGE.Translation: He walked away...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふぅ…帰ってこれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Phew... I'm back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Phew... I'm back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 入れ替わりに鈴が戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin came in, just as he left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin came in, just as he left.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうした？　空気がヘンだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's up? What's with the weird atmosphere?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's up? What's with the weird atmosphere?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まあ、この件に関しては決着がついた、ということだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, a conclusion has been reached regarding this matter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, a conclusion has been reached regarding this matter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「お、すごいな、いつの間にっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh, awesome, when did you do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh, awesome, when did you do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そういう手練れがいるんだってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's being taken care of right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's being taken care of right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そーか。なんかわからんけどよかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see. I don't get it, but I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see. I don't get it, but I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「今日はモンペチなくて寂しいけどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Today is a bit lonely without Mon Petit, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Today is a bit lonely without Mon Petit, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まー結果的には楽しかったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, all in all it was fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, all in all it was fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そいつはよかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's good to hear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's good to hear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「仕留めたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Did you bring him down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Did you bring him down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…逃げられた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...He ran away.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...He ran away.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これは長期戦になりそうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This is going to be a long battle...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This is going to be a long battle...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…疲れた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...I'm tired.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...I'm tired.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「弱音を吐くな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Stop complaining.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Stop complaining.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『うっさい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Shut up.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Shut up.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の息もあがっている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was short of breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was short of breath.

MESSAGE.JP: 無理もないだろう。ダッシュと攻撃、退却を繰り返しているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was only natural. She was running around and attacking, but it kept on retreating.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was only natural. She was running around and attacking, but it kept on retreating.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『でも、あいつが樹に止まる時間が多くなってきた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[But, it's started resting on branches more often.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[But, it's started resting on branches more often.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『でも、止まってる時間が多くなってきた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[But, it's begun halting more often.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[But, it's begun halting more often.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「疲れてきてるんだ。鈴挑発しろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It must be getting tired. Rin, provoke it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It must be getting tired. Rin, provoke it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『こらーっ、こんかーっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Hey you, over there!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Hey you, over there!]

MESSAGE.JP: びゅん…！
MESSAGE.EN: *Byun*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Byun*!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『うわ、ほんとにきた！　こわっ！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Whoa, it really came! Scary!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Whoa, it really came! Scary!]

MESSAGE.JP: 襲われたがかわせたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was attacked, but it seems she was able to avoid it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was attacked, but it seems she was able to avoid it.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『また見失った』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I lost sight of it again.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I lost sight of it again.]

MESSAGE.JP: すでに深夜となっている学校から、携帯を通じて鈴の声だけが聞こえ続けている。
MESSAGE.EN: It was already in the dead of night, we kept listening to Rin's voice coming from the cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was already in the dead of night, we kept listening to Rin's voice coming from the cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間を忘れ、僕たちはこの戦いを見守る。
MESSAGE.EN: Losing track of time, we were watching over the fight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Losing track of time, we were watching over the fight.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「状況はどうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's the situation?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's the situation?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『鉄棒の上に止まって、こっちを見てる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[He's sitting on a horizontal bar, looking at me.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[He's sitting on a horizontal bar, looking at me.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『花壇の中に座ってこっちを見てる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[He's sitting on a flower bed, looking at me.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[He's sitting on a flower bed, looking at me.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「周りには何もなしか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is there nothing else around?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is there nothing else around?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『うん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Yep.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Yep.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、正面から突っ込め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, attack from the front.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, attack from the front.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえのスピードなら勝てるはずだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You should win given your speed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You should win given your speed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『了解』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Roger.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Roger.]

MESSAGE.JP: ひゅん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Hyun*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Hyun*.

MESSAGE.JP: 静寂が訪れる。
MESSAGE.EN: A silence fell upon us.
MESSAGE.Translation: A silence fell upon us.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうだ…ついにやったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How'd it go... Are you finally finished?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How'd it go... Are you finally finished?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ぐったりして、もううごかないようだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[He's lying senseless, isn't moving anymore.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[He's lying senseless, isn't moving anymore.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、今だ、注射を！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, give it the shot now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, give it the shot now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらく沈黙が続く。
MESSAGE.EN: Nothing but silence for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nothing but silence for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は身動きはおろか、何も話そうとしない。
MESSAGE.EN: Not only was Rin still, even we didn't make a sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not only was Rin still, even we didn't make a sound.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうだ、どうなったんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「わからない…返事がない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know... She doesn't answer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know... She doesn't answer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 電話はまだ通じている。
MESSAGE.EN: The communication channel was still active.
MESSAGE.Translation: The communication channel was still active.

MESSAGE.JP: 向こうからかすかに聞こえるのは、明け方を告げる雀のさえずり。
MESSAGE.EN: A faint sound from the other end, the song of a sparrow announced the arrival of dawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: A faint sound from the other end, the song of a sparrow announced the arrival of dawn.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、もう夜が明けるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, night's over already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, night's over already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「もうそんな時間か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is it this late already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is it this late already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 東の空がうっすらと明るくなっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The eastern sky became suffused with a flickering glow of the coming day.
MESSAGE.Translation: The eastern sky became suffused with a flickering glow of the coming day.

MESSAGE.JP: 長い時間戦っていたとは感じてたけど、ここまで続くとは思わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had felt that the battle had dragged on for a long time, but I never suspected it'd continue for that long.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had felt that the battle had dragged on for a long time, but I never suspected it'd continue for that long.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 返事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: There still was no answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: There still was no answer.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、じっとしているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like she was intensely staring at something.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like she was intensely staring at something.

MESSAGE.JP: ややあって、ひと言だけ聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: A moment later, she answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: A moment later, she answered.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ものすごくきれいだった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[It was very beautiful.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[It was very beautiful.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『朝日にむかって飛んでいく姿が…。オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Him soaring high into the sky, against the morning sun... Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Him soaring high into the sky, against the morning sun... Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『朝日にむかって駆けていく姿が…。オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Him galloping into the sunrise... Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Him galloping into the sunrise... Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『朝日にむかって歩いていく姿が…。オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Him walking into the sunrise... Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Him walking into the sunrise... Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか…そいつはよかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see... that's good to hear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see... that's good to hear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ミッション完了だ、オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Mission completed, over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Mission completed, over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うわぁ…寝る時間、ほとんどない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Whoa... I didn't get a wink of sleep...
MESSAGE.Translation: Whoa... I didn't get a wink of sleep...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さて、今日も表に鈴を待機させてるはいいが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's nice having Rin on standby outdoors, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's nice having Rin on standby outdoors, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「相変わらずやることがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's nothing for her to do, like always.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's nothing for her to do, like always.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「やることがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's nothing for her to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's nothing for her to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、中に入れてあげようよ…また笹瀬川さんと戦う展開になるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's tell her to go inside then... she'll probably get to fight Sasasegawa-san again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's tell her to go inside then... she'll probably get to fight Sasasegawa-san again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいライバルじゃないか。そのほうが切磋琢磨できて、鈴にとっては有意義だと思うぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't she a good rival? It'll become a worthwhile experience for Rin, who can learn through this kind of competition.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't she a good rival? It'll become a worthwhile experience for Rin, who can learn through this kind of competition.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃーう。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『おなかすいたか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Are you hungry?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Are you hungry?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は猫と話しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was talking to a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was talking to a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『フリスキなら、ポケットにいくつか入ってたような』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I have enough Friskies in my pocket.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I have enough Friskies in my pocket.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『あった。ほら。よし、こっちもだっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[There. Look, I have some more here.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[There. Look, I have some more here.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『よし、おまえにもだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Here's some for you too.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Here's some for you too.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声@『あなた…わたくしをこんなもので手なずけられるとお思いで…？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[You... You think you can break me with this...?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[You... You think you can break me with this...?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『笹瀬川佐々美っ！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasegawa!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasegawa!]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「またでやがった!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She met her again!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She met her again!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『わたくしをそんな家畜と同等の扱い…こんな侮辱は初めてですわ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Treating me like a farm animal... This is the first time I've been insulted like this...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Treating me like a farm animal... This is the first time I've been insulted like this...]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『もう二度とそのへらず口、叩けなくしてやります』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[I shall shut that insolent mouth of yours.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[I shall shut that insolent mouth of yours.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『おまえたちっ、やっておしまいなさいっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]

MESSAGE.JP: びしっ！　ばしっ！　ばきっ！　どぐっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これだけどつきあって、よくアザ作らずに無事に戻ってこれるよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a miracle how she manages to return every time without so much as a bruise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a miracle how she manages to return every time without so much as a bruise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はいはい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしまで長い道のりでしたわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You've come a long way to finally face me now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You've come a long way to finally face me now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あーもう、ぜっったい今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやりますわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah geez, this time I'll make you eat dirt for sure!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah geez, this time I'll make you eat dirt for sure!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「見てなさい!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Just you watch!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Just you watch!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「このわたくしが…４戦４敗…ありえないことですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝For me... to lose four battles out of four... is unthinkable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝For me... to lose four battles out of four... is unthinkable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやりますわ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今度は本気で参りますわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら意外にやりますのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「こんな尻の青い下級生にすら勝てないなんて、話にもならないですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ミッションコンプリート』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、してないしてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、戦利品だ。やる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「念願の打倒棗鈴をついに佐々美様が達成された！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふっふっふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Fufufu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Fufufu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「って、念願とか、ついには余計ですわっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wha-, don't say things like long-sought or finally!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wha-, don't say things like long-sought or finally!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これぐらいお手の物ですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This much is an easy task for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This much is an easy task for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「はっ、お手の物でございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Ma'am, an easy task it was!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Ma'am, an easy task it was!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いきますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「本気になれば、よっっゆーーっですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ざっとこんなものですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: そうして夜も更けていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: And so the night went on...
